abstract: By acquiring Switzerland-based Foster Wheeler, the British engineering and project management firm would expand its footprint, including increasing its presence in Latin America.
snippet: By acquiring Switzerland-based Foster Wheeler, the British engineering and project management firm would expand its footprint, including increasing its presence in Latin America.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – Amec, the British engineering and project management company, said on Monday that it had agreed to acquire a Swiss-based rival for cash and stock in a deal valued at $3.2 billion.

headline.main: Amec Agrees to Buy Swiss Rival for $3.2 Billion

abstract: Suntory of Japan is buying Jim Beam for $13.6 billion. | Bank of America tells its junior bankers to take a day off. | Sides trade harsh words at trial of former SAC trader. | Bank regulators back down on leverage ratio.
snippet: Suntory of Japan is buying Jim Beam for $13.6 billion. | Bank of America tells its junior bankers to take a day off. | Sides trade harsh words at trial of former SAC trader. | Bank regulators back down on leverage ratio.
lead_paragraph: Suntory, known for producing Japan’s first whiskey, has agreed to acquire the maker of Jim Beam and Maker’s Mark bourbons, among other spirits, for $13.6 billion, DealBook reports. Including the assumption of debt, the deal is valued at $16 billion. Suntory is offering Jim Beam shareholders $83.50 a share in cash, 25 percent above the company’s closing price on Friday.
